channel.title: Need hlep with an error

item.title: Need hlep with an error
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Im lost as to this error, i think i did it all right and when i use the command to save stuff, if just lags off my client, and leaves me logged in

Exception in thread "Thread-1" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 10 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client_th.saveuserinfo(client_th.java:998) at client_th.handle_cmd(client_th.java:885) at client_th.parsecmd(client_th.java:793) at client_th.run(client_th.java:589)

thats the error, heres the code,

	public boolean saveuserinfo() {
		BufferedWriter userfile = null;
		try {
			userfile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./info/"+client.nickname+".txt"));
			userfile.write("[INFO]", 0, 10);
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.write(client.nickname, 0, 5);
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.write(client.passwd, 0, 5);
			userfile.newLine();
			/*userfile.write(client.ip, 0, 5);
			userfile.newLine();*/
			userfile.write(client.color, 0, 5);
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.write(""+playerRights, 0, 26);
			userfile.write(Integer.toString(playerRights), 0, Integer.toString(playerRights).length());
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.write(client.adminct, 0, 5);
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.newLine();
/*
userfile.write("[FRIENDS]", 0, 9);
			userfile.newLine();
                        for (int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) {
				if (friends[i] > 0) {
				userfile.write("user-friend = ", 0, 19);
				userfile.write(Integer.toString(i), 0, Integer.toString(i).length());
				userfile.write("	", 0, 1);
				userfile.write(Long.toString(friends[i]), 0, Long.toString(friends[i]).length());
				userfile.newLine();
				}
			}
                        userfile.newLine();
                        userfile.newLine();
*/
			userfile.newLine();
userfile.write("[EOF]", 0, 5);
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.newLine();
			userfile.close();
		} catch(IOException ioexception) {
			System.out.println(client.nickname+": error writing file.");
			return false;
		}
		return true;
	}
